newVersionAvailable: A new version of N Editor ({{version}}) is available.
There are currently no updates available: There are currently no updates available
updateDownloadBackground: {{appName}} will download the update in the background
The application will automatically resta: The application will automatically restart and install the update once the download is complete
You can keep using the application as us: You can keep using the application as usual. The update will be installed after you quit the application.
restartInstallVersion: {{appName}} is about to restart and install version {{version}}.
restartInstallVersionEditor: {{appName}} is about to restart and install version {{version}}. You can save your files beforehand.
